Class Herring

java.lang.Object
  OceanObject
      Fish
          Herring
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actor
public class Herring
extends Fish

A simple model of a herring. Herrings age, move, breed, and die. They eat plankton. They exhibit flocking behaviour - they tend to seek company.

Author:
Richard Jones, Michael Kolling and Matthew Maglennon

Method Detail

findLocationOfFood

protected Location findLocationOfFood(java.util.List<Location> surroundings)
Herring feed from the plankton level of their current square. They always return null.

Specified by:
findLocationOfFood in class Fish

setFollowLocation

public void setFollowLocation(Location toFollow)
Sets the location a herring should aim to follow

Parameters:
toFollow - The location to follow

chooseNextLocation

protected Location chooseNextLocation(java.util.List<Location> surroundings)
Herring chose where they would most like to move to, they prefer to follow a leader to maintaining direction. A leader will already be maintaining direction

Specified by:
chooseNextLocation in class Fish
Parameters:
surroundings - List of locations around the herring
Returns:
Returns the established best next location, either closest to a leader, maintaining direct, any other free adjacent location or null if none are free.

calculateNearestToLeader

private Location calculateNearestToLeader(java.util.List<Location> surroundings,
                                          Location leadersLocation)
Calculates the nearest location to a given location, used to find a location nearest to a leader herring. It does this by cross comparing two lists of Locations, empty locations around this herring, and empty locations around the leader herring.

Parameters:
surroundings - List of locations around the herring.
leadersLocation - The location this herring aims to get closest to.
Returns:
Returns a free location around the leader if any, else returns null.

informNearbyHerring

private void informNearbyHerring(java.util.List<Location> surroundings,
                                 Location futureLocation)
Finds fellow herrings in this herrings surroundings and informs them of where it is going

Parameters:
surroundings - List of locations around the herring
futureLocation - Where this herring is moving to
